compilations.description: Whether you’re trying to be healthy, pulling an all-nighter, or just trying to get through the day, protein-packed snacks are your best friends. That’s because protein can give you an energy boost and help you stay fuller longer. From avocado deviled eggs to cacao chia pudding, these snacks are full of protein-packed ingredients like Greek yogurt and almond butter, which will ensure you don’t get hangry anytime soon.
compilations.name: Protein-Packed Snacks

compilations.description: Can't sleep? Want to snack? These delicious snacks are a quick and easy fix to all your after-midnight hunger pangs. Chomp down on some hummus and carrot sticks or devour a couple handfuls of delicious oven-roasted chickpeas. And once you're full and satisfied, sail softly back into dreamland!
compilations.name: Healthy Snacks For Late-night Cravings

compilations.description: Planning a trip to the beach to celebrate the coming of summer? These easy snacks will make sure you're fueled and ready for the next game of water polo. From parmesan garlic & herb pita chips to super easy to make banana roll-ups, these treats are beach-friendly and hassle free. So what are you waiting for? Pack up your picnic basket with these goodies: summer's here!
compilations.name: Easy Snacks To Pack For Your Next Beach Trip

compilations.description: Looking for low-carb options? We've got plenty for you! The crispy Chicken Piccata and the saucy Ratatouille Lasagna each pack tons of flavor without going overboard on carbs — and they pair well with just about anything. The hardest part? Choosing which dish to make first!
compilations.name: Low Carb Meals For A Healthy You

compilations.description: You can never go wrong with avocado, and these easy mouthwatering recipes can enjoyed at any time of the day. Start your day with a wholesome Raddish Avocado Toast or enjoy a Salmon Crab Seafood Stack on a lunch date with your special someone. But why settle for one when you have 31 options to try from? Avo-fun for the whole month!
compilations.name: 31 Days 31 Avocado Recipes
Make Healthy Snacks Tasty With These Recipes

compilations.description: We've all had those days when you just don't feel like working out. Regardless of whether or not you make it to the gym, these recipes will keep you feeling engaged, alert, and fueled up for whatever comes your way. From caprese avocado bowls to spinach pasta, these meals are nutritious, delicious, and nourishing.
compilations.name: Recipes For When You Don't Feel Like Working Out

compilations.description: With so many health benefits, you ought to use yogurt wisely and creatively! It is easy to digest, packed with vitamins, and a rich source of protein as well. Make the Honey Granola Yogurt Bark for your on-the-go meals. Paprika-Spiced Chicken With Lemon Yogurt And Crispy Potatoes is the perfect dinner recipe as it is delicious, easy and healthy, all at the same time!
compilations.name: Use Your Yogurt Wisely!

results.description: This chicken salad is a lunchtime delight! Packed with creamy avocado, tender chicken, and crunchy veggies, it's a healthy and satisfying meal that won't weigh you down. Tossed in a tangy yogurt dressing with a hint of spice, it's a flavor explosion that's perfect for a light meal.

instructions.display_text: In a blender or food processor, combine the yogurt, lime juice, pepper, and chili powder and pulse to combine. Add ½ of the avocado and blend until creamy.
In a medium bowl, combine the chicken, yogurt sauce, celery, the remaining ½ avocado, onion, and salt. Mix until well combined.
Serve on low-carb bread and garnish with cilantro, or as desired.
Enjoy!

results.keywords: avocado, chia pudding, chicken salad, chickpea chips, deviled eggs, easy, healthy, keto, protein, snacks, vegan, vegetarian
results.name: Low-Carb Avocado Chicken Salad

compilations.description: Having trouble deciding what you should make next? Take a look at a few of the best pasta recipes we have to offer! From a vegan version of mac 'n' cheese to delicious baked meatballs and spaghetti, these ideas will satisfy every craving. Pair your pasta with a salad, dessert, and glass of wine — and you've got a restaurant-quality menu right at home!
compilations.name: Tasty's Best Pasta Recipes

compilations.description: We've curated a special assortment of pasta recipes just for you. From our unique tomato anchovy pasta to mouth-watering chicken, bacon and goat cheese pasta, these recipes are made to impress! We're going to go eat our hearts out now: time to get cooking!
compilations.name: Make The Perfect Bowl Of Pasta With These Recipes

results.description: Savor the bold flavors of this Tomato and Anchovy Pasta, a perfect weeknight meal that's both simple and satisfying. With a zesty tomato sauce and umami-packed anchovies, this dish will have your taste buds dancing in no time!

instructions.display_text: Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add 4 of the chopped anchovy filets and cook for 1 minute, until they begin to melt.

Add the panko bread crumbs and cook for 3 minutes, stirring frequently, until golden brown. Transfer the bread crumbs to a medium bowl and let cool to room temperature. Once cooled, toss with the Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.

Heat ¼ cup (60 ml) of olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the remaining 6 anchovies and cook for 2 minutes, stirring frequently, until the anchovies begin to melt into the oil.
Add the garlic and red pepper flakes and cook for 30 seconds, until fragrant.
Add the tomatoes and stir to coat in the oil. Season with 1 teaspoon of salt and cook for 5 minutes, or until the tomatoes just begin to soften.
Add the white wine and reduce the heat to low. Cook for 5 minutes, or until the sauce is reduced by half.

Add cooked pasta and reserved cooking water to the pot with the tomatoes and stir to combine. Cook for 1 minute, until the pasta is well coated and saucy. Drizzle with the remaining tablespoon of olive oil and season with salt. Toss to coat.
Serve the pasta topped with the anchovy bread crumbs and lemon zest
Enjoy!

results.keywords: family dinner, jonah peretti, secret ingredient pasta, tasty, tasty_contains_alcohol, tomato and anchovy pasta recipe, umami pasta
results.name: Tomato And Anchovy Pasta

components.raw_text: ¼ cup plus 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, divided
1 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste

components.extra_comment: cooked al dente, 1/4 cup (60 ml) cooking water reserved
components.raw_text: 1 pound spaghetti, cooked al dente, ¼ cup cooking water reserved

compilations.description: Too lazy to cook? These super-quick and easy recipes are perfect for you! From our all time favorite cheesy garlic broccoli to juicy teriyaki chicken, these ideas will delight everyone's taste buds and keep you craving even more. Open up our treasure-trove of recipes and never go hungry ever again!
compilations.name: 3 Ingredient Recipes To Make Your Life Easy

compilations.description: Looking for a fancy meal to cook that doesn't require too much effort? These 3-ingredient, 3-course meal recipe sets are perfect for you. Whether it's a date night or a movie night with friends, cook up these meals in no time and serve to impress everyone. Start with mouth-watering jalapeno poppers and end your meal with a sweet chocolate strawberry braid. We've got something for every taste, no matter what.
compilations.name: 3-Ingredient 3 Course Meal

compilations.description: Having trouble meal-prepping? Not to fear, we've brought you a weekly meal plan for an entire week with just 3 ingredients for each dish. For instance, tuck into a hearty Tomato Avocado Egg Salad for a cozy Sunday at home. Take a glance and let us know which ones are your favorites!
compilations.name: 3 Ingredient Recipes For An Entire Week

compilations.description: Are you famished but too tired to cook? Well, look no further: these super easy recipes will keep all of your hunger pangs at bay. From a delicious two-ingredient chocolate cake to a three-ingredient teriyaki chicken you can whip up these mouthwatering (and fool-proof!) recipes in no time.
compilations.name: No-Fuss Recipes For Those Lazy Days

compilations.description: Chicken is always a crowd favorite, but we you gotta switch it up! Say goodbye to your plain Jane chicken recipes and taste test our carefully picked recipes. If you are a guac fiend like we are, you will absolutely devour the Bacon Guacamole Chicken Bombs and if you're going the fancy route, the Buffalo Chicken Dip is a must-have! Don't forget to pick your favorites!
compilations.name: 30 Ways You've Never Eaten Chicken Before

compilations.description: Everyone's a chicken lover but have you ever tried to challenge yourself with something impressively delicious? We're about to transform you into a masterchef. For a low-lift chicken recipe, try 3-ingredient teriyaki chicken. Then, when you're in the mood for a challenge, try out our mouth-watering crispy creamy chicken cordon bleu. Aprons at the ready – it's cooking time!
compilations.name: Easy To Hard: Chicken Recipes

compilations.description: Just because you haven't had the time to go grocery shopping doesn't mean you can't come up with a tasty and filling meal. Our baked halibut, Cajun BBQ ribs, and teriyaki chicken are absolutely delicious dinners, and best of all, they each require only three ingredients. Oh, how could we forget about dessert? Our hazelnut brownies and creme brulee are just as simple. From our kitchen to yours, you’re welcome.
compilations.name: 3-Ingredient Recipes That Will Change Your Life

compilations.description: Everyone can use a handful of quick, easy meals that fill you right up. From our versatile teriyaki chicken to our easy finger sandwiches, these recipes will keep you satisfied. Open up this treasure trove of recipes and bookmark them for lazy nights.
compilations.name: Easy Recipes That Will Fill You Up

compilations.description: Want to experience the exotic flavors from around the world but too busy to travel? Here's the solution, why not bring the destination to your kitchen! The Japanese culinary export is waiting at your doorstep. Grab your bowls and put on your favorite Ghibli movie because you are invited to bask in the Japanese culinary culture.
compilations.name: Bring Japan To Your Kitchen

compilations.description: You should be taking advantage of these recipes especially when you're pressed for time in the kitchen! With these, you can whip up a divine garlic shrimp scampi within 30 minutes. Want to make a quick lunch for office? Make a healthy thai tofu collard wraps for lunch. Cooking has never been quicker!
compilations.name: Meals In Under 30 Minutes

compilations.description: End the year with a culinary big bang! 2022 is coming to an end, but your nights shouldn't without tasting these delicious recipes. We have got Baked Lobster Tails, Creamy Tuscan Chicken, Korean-Style BBQ Beef, or a 20-Minute One-Pan Pizza to cover all of your cravings. Are you convinced or should we go on?
compilations.name: Tasty Dinners for Every Night of December

compilations.description: Looking for inspiration in the New Year? Get back to basics with Tasty's Top 10 recipes to make in January. Tasty is here to help you savor the flavor and rediscover the joy of cooking—turning each creation into something you will enjoy.
compilations.name: Getting Back to Basics

results.description: Even though this chicken teriyaki dish uses just three ingredients, the flavor is outstanding, and you can't beat the quick cooking time! This effortless weeknight meal starts with browning pieces of boneless chicken thighs in a hot pan. Soy sauce and brown sugar are added, infusing the meat with the perfect balance of sweet and salty. The liquid sizzles and thickens in the pan into a delectable teriyaki sauce that envelops the chicken, ensuring each bite is packed with flavor. Paired with fluffy white rice, this dish goes from stove to table in 30 minutes, proving that minimal effort can yield maximum satisfaction.

instructions.display_text: Heat a large nonstick pan over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and sear until golden brown on both sides.
Add the soy sauce and brown sugar and stir to combine, then bring to a boil. Cook until the sauce reduces and coats the chicken.
Serve with rice, if desired.
Enjoy!

results.name: 3-Ingredient Teriyaki Chicken

components.raw_text: 2 pounds chicken thighs, sliced into chunks

results.description: Say hello to a taste of the bayou with this creamy Cajun pasta! Savory sausage and a bevy of vegetables get a spicy kick with a Cajun-inspired seasoning blend, all tossed in a luscious creamy sauce. Best of all, it all comes together in just one pot for easy prep and clean-up!

instructions.display_text: In a large, heavy-bottomed pot, melt the butter over medium heat until just bubbling. Add the sausage, then season with salt. Brown for 2 minutes on one side, then stir and brown on the other side for 2 minutes more.

Add the onion, season with salt, and cook for 2 minutes, until starting to soften. Add the jalapeño, garlic, and tomato paste. Stir to distribute the tomato paste. Add the Jazzy spice blend and stir to combine.

Add the pasta, red and green peppers, mushrooms, and salt and stir to combine. Pour in the tomatoes and stock. Bring to a gentle boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 10-12 minutes, until the pasta is cooked through and the peppers are tender but not mushy.
Mix in the cream cheese to create a thick, creamy sauce.
Serve garnished with scallions, if desired.
Enjoy!

results.name: Creamy Cajun Pasta

components.raw_text: 1 pound spicy Italian sausage links, cut into rounds
1 red bell pepper, seeded and thinly sliced
1 green bell pepper, seeded and thinly sliced
8 ounces button mushrooms, stemmed and sliced

compilations.description: This selection of 52 (!!) kid-friendly recipes is a lifesaver for all parents. You’ll find easy after-school snacks like pizza chips, healthy but delicious breakfasts like these PB&J overnight oats, along with plenty of fun recipes to make with your kids for brunch or as a weekend activity. And fair warning: lots of these will be a big hit with the grownups, too!
compilations.name: 52 Kid-Friendly Recipes

compilations.description: How much chocolate is too much chocolate? These easy and tasty chocolatey treats cover all the bases for the chocolate season. Kick it off with crowd-pleasing classics like a Stuffed Chocolate Chip Cookie, or try a modern and Instagram-ready treat like Cookies 'n Cream Cheesecake Bundt Cake. Whatever you choose, just know that you can never go wrong with chocolate!
compilations.name: Is This Too Much Chocolate For Your Eyes?

compilations.description: Mug cooking is one of the greatest boons of our existence. You can snap up a quick, yet delicious, meal all in one dish. This rigatoni looks fancy AF, but comes out of a mug. Have frequent midnight cravings? Bookmark this pizza in a mug or check out these different flavored mug cakes. For busy mornings, we recommend this blueberry french toast in a mug. Get your mugs ready already!
compilations.name: Everything You Can Cook In A Mug

results.description: This single-serving chocolate mug cake delivers on all counts and surpasses all expections! It's an easy recipe with simple ingredients that yields an incredibly moist, fudgy cake with mouthwatering flavor in every bite. Start by mixing basic pantry staples like flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and milk in your favorite mug. Top with a generous dollop of hazelnut spread, then sit back and watch as this decadent concoction transforms into a gourmet dessert in under two minutes in the microwave. You can whip up this delectable dessert whenever the craving strikes and savor life's little luxuries one spoonful at a time.

instructions.display_text: In a 12-ounce (375 ml) mug or larger, mix all ingredients (except the chocolate hazelnut spread) until just combined.
Once combined, spoon the chocolate hazelnut spread on top of the batter.
Microwave on high for 90 seconds to 2 minutes, watching to make sure it doesn’t spill over (depending on the size of the mug).
Let cool one minute before eating. Top with additional chocolate hazelnut spread and powdered sugar (optional).
Enjoy!

results.name: Chocolate Mug Cake

components.raw_text: 1 tablespoon oil, such as vegetable or canola

compilations.name: 7 Pasta Recipes For All Pasta Lovers
7 Pasta Recipes You'll Want To Bookmark ASAP

compilations.description: When life gives you lemons, make one of these recipes! These versatile lemon-forward dishes are easy to make and taste impressive. Not sure where to start? The creamy lemon chicken pairs well with just about anything, and the French-style lemon tart will definitely have people coming back for another slice.
compilations.name: Lemony and Tangy Recipes

compilations.description: You can never go wrong with shrimp, and these easy and delicious recipes will make sure everyone keeps coming back for seconds. Call your family and friends over for some fried shrimp mango salsa hand roll-up and whip up a couple of dozen honey Hawaiian garlic shrimp and watch everyone go ham on the shrimp!

compilations.description: Craving shrimp recipes? We’ve got you covered. But why settle for just one when we’ve curated 30 mouthwatering shrimp recipes to excite your tastebuds? Start with our crowd-pleasing Vegetable and Shrimp Lumpia or try a fancy Hawaiian Garlic Shrimp and Mac Salad. These impressive recipes won't let you down.
compilations.name: 30 Shrimp Recipes

compilations.description: We've curated a special assortment of pasta recipes just for you. From our unique tomato anchovy pasta to mouth-watering chicken, bacon and goat cheese pasta, these recipes are made to impress! We're going to go eat our hearts out now: time to get cooking!

compilations.description: If you are a Leo, we know you are trendy, outgoing and generous. So your food and drink choices should reflect that. Our cheese-stuffed mashed potato balls are a hit at any party, just like your dazzliing personality. And the lemon garlic sshrimp pasta is the perfect match for your luxurious vibe. We also recommend you celebrate your life with the mango lime cheesecake/a>.
compilations.name: Recipes Leos Will Love
Make Healthy Snacks Tasty With These Recipes

compilations.description: Living on your own can get overwhelming having to keep up with grocery lists and meal prepping all by yourself. And that's why we've found just the right recipes that allow you to take it easy but also feel proud about taking care of yourself! The instant noodle lasagna is a twist on a lazy staple. And of course brownies are a must for your midnight munchy routine. This one just needsONE bowl! Bookmark this balsamic chicken and veggies meal prep recipe to meet your daily veggies and protein intake for busy weeks. Time for some adultin'!
compilations.name: Recipes To Celebrate Moving Out Of Your Parents House

compilations.description: Wake up in the morning and heat up last nights pizza? Is that you? Dont worry we have you covered! Start your day the healthy way by eating right! Your new day deserves and fresh and healthy start and with peanut-butter-energy-bites or why not try our healthier-fried-rice the options are endless!
compilations.name: A Healthy Start To Your Day!

compilations.description: You should be taking advantage of these recipes especially when you're pressed for time in the kitchen! With these, you can whip up a divine garlic shrimp scampi within 30 minutes. Want to make a quick lunch for office? Make a healthy thai tofu collard wraps for lunch. Cooking has never been quicker!
compilations.name: Meals In Under 30 Minutes

compilations.description: Who doesn't love pasta? Look forward to every single day of the week with these 7 amazing pasta dishes! You'll keep coming back for more, from creamy Chicken Alfredo to delectable Lemon and Garlic Spaghetti! Satisfy your mid-week cravings with Creamy One-Pot Spinach Shrimp Pasta. Serve up some al dente goodness all week long!
compilations.name: 7 Days, 7 Pasta Dishes

compilations.description: Looking for a way to brighten up your meals? Look no further! Start your day off right with some fluffy Lemon Ricotta Pancakes. Then, cool off in the afternoon with a refreshing Watermelon-Lime Slushie. Whether you're looking for something sweet or tangy, this collection of recipes featuring lemon, lime, and other citrus fruits has you covered. Get ready to add some zest to your meals!
compilations.name: 5 Zesty Citrus Recipes

results.description: This easy 30-minute pasta recipe transforms ingredients that you already have in your kitchen into a posh, seafood dish you’ll want to serve at your next dinner party. And since the whole dish is made in a single pot, clean-up is easy. Don’t be surprised if this becomes your favorite quick go-to.

instructions.display_text: In a large pot, boil water and add pasta. Cook (stirring frequently) until al dente.
Drain and set pasta aside.
In the same pan, heat olive oil and 2 tablespoons of butter. Add garlic and crushed red pepper, cook until fragrant.
Toss in shrimp, salt and pepper to taste, and stir until shrimp start to turn pink, but are not fully cooked.
Add oregano and spinach, cook until wilted.
Return cooked pasta to the pot, add remaining butter, parmesan, and parsley. Stir until well mixed and the butter is melted.
When the shrimp are cooked, add lemon juice, mix once more, then serve while hot.
Enjoy!

results.name: One-Pot Lemon Garlic Shrimp Pasta

compilations.name: 5 Cookie Recipes To Brighten Up Your Day

compilations.description: If you're looking for a taste of the cookies you had in your childhood, you've come to the right place! Here are six homemade cookie recipes that will definitely remind you of the past. Whether you reach for classic chocolate chip cookies or fan-favorite iced oatmeal cookies, all of these delicious treats are sure to leave you satisfied and full!
compilations.name: 6 Classic Homemade Cookie Recipes

compilations.description: One can never go wrong with cookies and these recipes cater to everything your sweet tooth needs. Munch on the classic chocolate chip, or mix it up with fun aquarium cookies. Just make sure to keep a glass of milk handy!
compilations.name: Cookies For All Your Sugar Cravings

compilations.description: If you love peanut butter as much as we do, this array of sweet treats is just for you! Try out our incredible chocolate peanut butter cheesecake and then bake yourselves some melt-in-your-mouth peanut butter cookies. You might get a little nutty with these recipes but hey, when it comes to dessert, anything's fair game!
compilations.name: How Many Peanut Butter Treats Can You Check Off From This List?

compilations.description: Why whip up a storm when you can make delicious, mouthwatering desserts with JUST 3 ingredients? If you're running low on ingredients well, these recipes are here to save the day: Indulge in our gooey and ultra-flavorful Chocolate Mousse or test out the Banana Pancakes to make your meal super-satisfying and ever-so-sweet. Cook up a variety of desserts with just 3 ingredients: which 3-ingredient pick has your tastebuds in a tizz?
compilations.name: Desserts You Can Make With Just 3 Ingredients

compilations.description: Entertaining a crowd and don't have time to fire up your oven? We've got you covered with 33 of our best 3-ingredient desserts. You can pick between a cookie butter cake or cookies & cream ice cream! Or go the classic route and make yourself a delicious batch of brownies. All you need are three ingredients and a sweet tooth (we know you've got that covered). So what are you waiting for? Let's get cooking!
compilations.name: 33 3-Ingredient Sweet Treats!

compilations.description: A crunchy salad, delicious appetizers and a scrumptious main course... Not enough? Dinner leaving you craving for something more? End the night with our most popular and indulgent desserts.. Choose between a . light lemon meringue or a Swedish sticky chocolate cake ! Word from the wise "FEAST ON BOTH!"
compilations.name: After Dinner Comes Dessert

results.description: Indulge in the simplest yet most satisfying treat with these 3-Ingredient Peanut Butter Cookies. Made with just peanut butter, sugar, and an egg, these cookies are a breeze to whip up, requiring minimal effort and time (under 30 minutes!). Plus, with such basic pantry staples, there's a good chance you have everything you need in your kitchen to make them right now! Gluten-free and utterly delicious, these cookies boast a perfect balance of sweet, savory, and nutty. Whether you're a baking novice or a seasoned pro, these peanut butter cookies are sure to become a quick favorite for any occasion.

instructions.display_text: Preheat oven to 350ºF (180ºC).
In a large bowl, mix together the peanut butter, sugar, and egg.
Scoop out a spoonful of dough and roll it into a ball. Place the cookie balls onto a nonstick baking sheet.
For extra decoration and to make them cook more evenly, flatten the cookie balls by pressing a fork down on top of them, then press it down again at a 90º angle to make a criss-cross pattern.
Bake for 8-10 minutes or until the bottom of the cookies are golden brown.
Remove from baking sheet and cool.
Enjoy!

results.keywords: cookies, dessert, easy, flourless, jr, junior, kids, peanut butter, recipe, tasty, tasty_vegetarian
results.name: 3 Ingredient Peanut Butter Cookies

compilations.description: Having trouble deciding what you should make next? Take a look at a few of the best pasta recipes we have to offer! From a vegan version of mac 'n' cheese to delicious baked meatballs and spaghetti, these ideas will satisfy every craving. Pair your pasta with a salad, dessert, and glass of wine — and you've got a restaurant-quality menu right at home!
compilations.name: Tasty's Best Pasta Recipes

compilations.description: Despite so many options, classic penne is always a great choice when it comes to pasta. It’s easy to cook, delicious, and pairs well with almost any sauce. Creamy Chicken Penne Pasta will always satisfy, or try the Fajita Pasta Bake for a creative twist. Add as many or as few veggies as you want and you’re good to go!
compilations.name: Penne For Your Thoughts

results.description: If you're in need of a hug in a bowl, this creamy chicken penne pasta is just the ticket. With tender chicken, perfectly cooked pasta, and a velvety sauce, it's pure comfort in a bowl.

instructions.display_text: In a deep skillet, fry the bacon until crispy. Remove to a paper towel to drain, then chop.
In the same skillet, add the chicken and season with salt, pepper, Italian seasoning, and paprika. Cook until no longer pink inside.
Add the garlic and cook until softened.
Add spinach and tomatoes and cook until the spinach is wilted.
Add the cream, Parmesan, an red pepper flakes and bring to a boil.
Add the penne and bacon, and stir until fully coated in sauce.
Serve with parsley, Parmesan, and red pepper flakes, if desired.
Enjoy!

results.name: Creamy Chicken Penne Pasta

compilations.name: Garlic Shrimp Alfredo Dinner For Two

compilations.description: Calling all seafood lovers! Cooking fish and shellfish at home may seem intimidating — but it doesn't actually have to be. These easy popcorn shrimp, for example, are ready in under 30 minutes and only need five ingredients. Or, if you're already a seafood pro, impress everyone with this gourmet-style herb-crusted salmon. Let’s get cooking!
compilations.name: 7 Recipes For Seafood Lovers

compilations.description: When in doubt for dinner? Make fish! Recipes like
compilations.name: Fish Lovers Only

compilations.description: Are you looking for meals to cook on that special date night? Don't worry, we've got you covered. Try our super fancy lobster dinner for two to impress your significant other, or indulge in an equally stunning garlic shrimp alfredo dinner. Light those candles and get ready to celebrate!
compilations.name: Romantic Meals For Two

compilations.description: We've curated a list of lip-smacking recipes that will make you 'gar-lick' your fingers. The 3-cheese garlic bread is a classic and great for a party or movie night. For a more decadent option, dig into the honey garlic slow cooker ribs. The 40-clove garlic chicken is also a must try. After all, we all know that there is no such thing as too much garlic!
compilations.name: 'Gar-lick' Your Fingers With These Mouthwatering Recipes

compilations.description: For meat lovers, breakfast is usually incomplete without some crispy bacon on the side with their morning eggs. The smoky flavor of the sliced meat along with its melting layers is a treat to dig into! Here's a guide to how you can create some amazing dishes using bacon. From cheesy-bacon-twists to href="https://tasty.co/recipe/bacon-wrapped-parmesan-garlic-knots"> bacon-wrapped-parmesan-garlic-knots , we can safely say, "Bacon makes everything better!"
compilations.name: Bacon Makes Everything Better!

compilations.description: Ah, cheeeese. It's easily one of the most mouth-watering foods out there! Everything about cheese just feels like a giant, warm hug. And it's so versatile, you just can't go wrong! Indulge in some cheesy goodness with our 3-Ingredient Mac & Cheese, Garlic Shrimp Bacon Alfredo Pasta (now that's a mouthful, pun intended), or our favorite Classic Lasagna! Now let's cut to the cheese and make some amazing cheese dishes!
compilations.name: Let's Just Cut To The Cheese!

results.description: This garlic bacon shrimp alfredo is the ultimate weeknight indulgence, with succulent shrimp, smoky bacon, and a rich, creamy sauce that will have your taste buds dancing with delight.

instructions.display_text: In a large pot, cook the bacon over medium heat until crispy.
Add the shrimp, salt, and pepper and cook until the shrimp is pink and opaque. Remove the shrimp and bacon from the pot, leaving any fat from cooking the bacon behind.
Add the onions, tomatoes, and garlic to the pot and cook until the garlic is starting to brown.
Add the cream and bring to a boil.

Once the cream is boiling, add the fettuccine. Return the shrimp and bacon to the pan, along with the Parmesan cheese and parsley. Stir until the cheese melts and the sauce coats the shrimp and pasta nicely.
Nutrition  Calories: 2185 Fat: 125 grams  Carbs: 192 grams Fiber: 9 grams  Sugars: 20 grams  Protein: 103 grams
Enjoy!

results.keywords: alfredo dinner for two, dinner for two, garlic shrimp alfredo, garlic shrimp alfredo for two, garlic shrimp pasta, shrimp alfredo dinner for two, valentine’s day dinner for two
results.name: Garlic Shrimp Bacon Alfredo

compilations.description: Sweating over how to serve a Thanksgiving feast that pleases everyone? Put the baster down and take a breath. Tasty is here to bring you no-fail Thanksgiving recipes. Think showstopping, succulent entrees, delectable, can’t-help-yourself-to-have-one-more-bite sides, and then some. Still hungry? Make room for flavorful, festive desserts to finish off your palette. Whether you're a seasoned chef or a hosting novice, these Tasty recipes guarantee a stress-free and unforgettable Thanksgiving. This holiday only comes once a year, so let’s enjoy it.
compilations.keywords: thanksgiving, brussels sprouts, turkey, potatoes, pie
compilations.name: A Very Tasty Thanksgiving

results.description: Embark on a caffeinated adventure with whipped coffee, a viral sensation that's taken the world by storm. With just three simple ingredients, you can recreate the magic of a bustling South Korean cafe right in your own kitchen. Mix hot water, sugar, and instant coffee in a bowl, then whisk until the mixture transforms into a cloud-like foam. Spoon the foam over ice-cold milk in a glass and watch the creamy coffee cascade through the milk, creating a mesmerizing swirl of flavors. Whether you're seeking a morning pick-me-up or a delightful afternoon treat, whipped coffee promises to elevate your coffee-drinking ritual to new heights!

instructions.display_text: Add the hot water, sugar, and instant coffee to a bowl.
Either hand whisk or use an electric mixer until the mixture is fluffy and light.
To serve, spoon a dollop over a cup of milk with ice in it and stir.
Enjoy!

compilations.description: Time for an adventure! Let's turn back in time to our childhood nostalgia. It's time to revisit the pages of your favorite Famous Five adventures, accompanied by these tasty recipes.  No matter who your favorite character is, we have a recipe for everyone, even for the fans of our favorite dog, Timmy!
compilations.name: If Famous Five Characters were a Recipe

results.description: This easy mac and cheese is a quick and delicious dinner option for busy weeknights! Elbow macaroni is cooked right in the same pot with milk, butter, and Cheddar cheese, resulting in a creamy and comforting dish that's sure to please everyone. Add in some chopped bacon or cooked veggies for a twist on the classic recipe, or enjoy it as-is for a simple and satisfying meal.

instructions.display_text: In a large pot on medium-high heat, gently bring the milk to a simmer over medium heat. Add the macaroni and cook until tender. Remove the pot from the heat.
Add the butter, cheddar, salt, and pepper to the noodles and stir until the cheese and butter melt into the milk to create a thick sauce that coats the noodles.
Sprinkle with parsley and serve.
Enjoy!

compilations.description: Let's face it: we all love food. What we don't like, though? Well look no further and try out these recipes that are set to make your week easy, simple, and oh-so-delicious!

compilations.description: Sometimes you just want to cook something easy and delicious that won’t leave a dent in your wallet. compilations.name: Budget-Friendly Recipes 8 Ways!

results.description: These pancakes are fluffy, moist, and delicious, and best of all, they're healthy! Made with ripe bananas, whole wheat flour, and no added sugar, they're a guilt-free breakfast option.

instructions.display_text: Mash bananas in a large bowl until smooth. Mix in eggs and vanilla until well combined, then mix in oats and cinnamon.

Heat a skillet to medium and add in a scoop* of the pancake batter. Smooth out to form an even layer. Cook for about 2-3 minutes until you start to see bubbles releasing from the top of the batter. Flip and cook until the other side is golden brown, about 1-2 minutes.
Garnish your pancakes with your favorite toppings! We used banana slices, chopped walnuts & maple syrup.
*Note: Use ½ cup (65) for scooping the batter to yield 4 thicker pancakes; Use ⅓ cup (40 g) to yield 6 smaller pancakes.
Enjoy!

results.name: Healthy Banana Pancakes

compilations.description: Adulting is hard, and so is budgeting. From garlic shrimp scampi to chili cheese dog boats, these budget-friendly meals will keep you fueled without emptying out your wallet. Indulgent, comforting, and easy to throw together, these recipes are perfect when you need to feed yourself without spending a fortune! So what are you waiting for? Tuck away your wallet and let’s get cooking.

6 Delicious And Unique Spaghetti Recipes You Cannot Resist

compilations.description: Busy week? These dinner recipes are perfect after a long day of work, when you just don't feel like cooking something overly elaborate. From easy shrimp scampi toveggie curry with naan, all of these dishes are simple, tasty, and take less than 20 minutes to prepare.
compilations.name: 5 Simple and Scrumptious Weeknight Dinners

compilations.description: It's been a long time since you've had a classic getaway that lets you escape the stresses of life. results.description: This garlic shrimp scampi is a flavor explosion in your mouth! The succulent shrimp is cooked to perfection and coated in a heavenly garlic and butter sauce. Toss in some lemon juice and parsley, and you've got yourself a dish that'll transport you straight to the Italian coast.

instructions.display_text: Heat the pot over medium heat.
Melt the butter in the pot.
Cook the garlic until it starts to brown.
Add the shrimp, salt, and pepper, cooking until shrimp is pink all the way through.
Add the lemon juice, chili flakes, and parsley.
Add the spaghetti, and toss until evenly coated.
Enjoy!

results.name: Garlic Shrimp Scampi

compilations.description: What's better than making the best out of your most used kitchen essential: Mug! No pulling out 3 bowls, 2 pans for cooking and spending hours cleaning up the dishes. compilations.description: Mug cooking is one of the greatest boons of our existence. You can snap up a quick, yet delicious, meal all in one dish. This rigatoni looks fancy AF, but comes out of a mug. Have frequent midnight cravings? Bookmark this pizza in a mug or check out these different flavored mug cakes. For busy mornings, we recommend this blueberry french toast in a mug. Get your mugs ready already!
compilations.name: Everything You Can Cook In A Mug

results.description: We’ve got news for you: You can celebrate your birthday any day of the year, thanks to this single-serve birthday cake in a mug. All you have to do is combine the ingredients into a mug or ramekin, microwave it for about two minutes, and voilà: Warm and delicious birthday cake for one.

instructions.display_text: In a 12-ounce (375 ml) or larger mug , mix all ingredients until just combined.
Microwave on high for 90 seconds to 2 minutes, watching to make sure it doesn’t spill over (depending on the size of the mug).
Let cool one minute before eating. Top with whipped topping and sprinkles (optional).
Enjoy!

results.name: Birthday Cake Mug Cake

compilations.description: Ah, cheeeese. It's easily one of the most mouth-watering foods out there! Everything about cheese just feels like a giant, warm hug. Indulge in some cheesy goodness with our 3-Ingredient Mac & Cheese, Garlic Shrimp Bacon Alfredo Pasta (now that's a mouthful, pun intended), or our favorite Classic Lasagna! Now let's cut to the cheese and make some amazing cheese dishes!
compilations.name: Let's Just Cut To The Cheese!

results.description: Eating a bowl of mac and cheese is like taking a trip down memory lane. Think back to those childhood dinners where a steaming pot of macaroni and cheese awaited, its irresistible allure of gooey, cheesy goodness promising pure comfort. Now, imagine recreating that nostalgic magic with our exclusive 3-ingredient mac-hack. You read that correctly: just three simple ingredients lead to culinary bliss. We've stripped away the complexity (no roux needed!) without compromising on flavor, using only the essentials — milk, cheese, and pasta — to craft a quick and easy meal that surpasses the boxed version in every way.

instructions.display_text: In a large pot, bring the milk to a boil.
Add the pasta and stir constantly until the pasta is cooked, about 10 minutes.
Turn off the heat, then add the cheddar. Stir until the cheese is melted and the pasta is evenly coated.
Enjoy!

results.name: 3-ingredient Mac & Cheese

results.description: The Microwave 5-Minute Mac N Cheese is a classic comfort food that can be made in just 5 minutes. This cheesy and creamy macaroni and cheese is perfect for a quick and easy lunch or dinner.

instructions.display_text: Mix the macaroni, water, and salt in a microwaveable mug.
Microwave for 2-3 minutes, then stir.
Add the milk, cheese, salt, and pepper, then stir.
Microwave for another 30 seconds, stir, and garnish with a sprinkle of chives.
Enjoy!

results.description: This pesto chicken and veggies meal prep is a lifesaver for anyone who's looking for a quick and easy way to eat healthy during the week! Tender chicken breasts, green beans and tomatoes are coated in a delicious basil pesto.

instructions.display_text: Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium heat, then add the chicken thighs. Season with salt and pepper. Cook until the chicken is no longer pink in the center, then remove from the pan. Slice into strips.
Add the green beans to the same pan and cook until tender-crisp.
Return the chicken strips to the pan, then add the tomatoes and pesto. Stir until fully incorporated.
Serve immediately or divide into 4 food storage containers and store in the refrigerator for up to 4 days.
Enjoy!

results.keywords: chicken, green beans, meal-prep, one-pan, pesto, tomatoes, veggies
results.name: Weekday Meal-Prep Pesto Chicken & Veggies

compilations.name: Meal Prep Dinners For The Week
4 Meal Prep Chicken Recipes For The Week Ahead

compilations.description: Trying to balance a hectic work schedule with a lean, high protein diet? Meal-prepping for the entire week might be the perfect answer for you. Plan ahead with this easy and tasty Pesto Chicken Pasta. Or, mix it up with some Chicken Teriyaki Stir Fry. You'll save tons of time and feast on some great dishes while you're at it!

compilations.description: Have a really busy week coming up? Well that's no excuse to not eat! We're here to fuel your mind, body, and soul, in the most delicious way possible. Our turkey taco bowl is delicious and will keep you filled up, and our vegetarian grain bowl is an ideal option for vegetarians and vegans. Don't sweat, we've got your back (and your rumbling tummy)!

compilations.description: Looking for inspiration in the New Year? Get back to basics with Tasty's Top 10 recipes to make in January. Tasty is here to help you savor the flavor and rediscover the joy of cooking—turning each creation into something you will enjoy.
compilations.name: Getting Back to Basics

results.description: Weekday meal prep just got easier with this chicken teriyaki stir-fry! It's quick, easy, and full of flavor - the perfect meal to power you through your busy week.

instructions.display_text: In a pan, cook cut chicken over medium-high heat until almost done. Salt and pepper to taste.
Reduce heat to medium and stir in the crushed garlic.
Add in the soy sauce, honey, and 1 tablespoon of the sesame seeds. Stir until thickened.
Remove the chicken from the pan, leaving the sauce, and add the vegetables to the pan.
Cover the pan for several minutes and cook until the vegetables begin to soften, then remove the lid and stir until the sauce is thick again.
Split the rice, vegetables, and chicken evenly between 4 containers. Top with a sprinkle of sesame seeds and sliced green onion. Refrigerate for up to 4 days.
Enjoy!

results.keywords: bowl, chicken, meal-prep, rice, teriyaki, vegetables
results.name: Weekday Meal-prep Chicken Teriyaki Stir-fry

compilations.description: Nothing spells 'sumptuous' like a lip-smaking stir-fry. Our 20-minute beef and broccoli stir-fry is as easy to make as it is to eat. If you're feeling fancy, though, you can try the honey garlic shrimp stir-fry. Need a vegetarian option? Our tofu stir-fry won't disappoint. Get your woks and chopsticks out already!

Honey is truly the nectar of the gods.

The honey-garlic-shrimp-stir-fry is a crowd favorite! For a fun-filled baking day, we recommend the Honey Glazed German Apple Bake! We have New York City Dog for all the KD stans, a California Roll Sushi Bowl for all the fans from LA, and plenty more!

compilations.description: These recipes are for those lazy days we all experience. Those days when even moving your finger feels like a chore! From Hasselback Pizza Chicken to Meatball Sub Bake , we have you covered. So sit back and be lazy. After all, you deserve it!

compilations.description: Ain't nothin' sweeter than honey. Check out these addictive and fun recipes that use honey in the best way! There arguably isn't a better snack than the Honey Lime Sriracha Chicken Poppers. One-Pan Honey Garlic Chicken is an easy-to-make meal that will leave you satisfied! Make those wings better than ever with the tastiest Honey Garlic Chicken Wings!
compilations.name: Honey Dishes That Are Must-Haves

compilations.description: Whip up a quick and flavorful meal with these sensational stir-fry recipes! Try the One-Pan Drunken Noodles, packed with bold Thai-inspired flavors, or the One-Pan Chicken and Broccoli Stir-Fry, loaded with tender chicken and crisp broccoli in a savory sauce. This collection is a must-try for busy cooks looking for delicious and easy-to-make meals. Get your wok ready and savor these flavors, perfect for weeknight dinners or a quick and satisfying meal anytime!
compilations.name: Quick & Easy Stir-Fry Recipes

results.description: Make this delectable shrimp stir-fry with honey and garlic for a speedy and satisfying weeknight dinner! This dish is packed with succulent shrimp, crisp veggies, and a mouthwatering honey garlic sauce that’s irresistibly good. The combination of flavors will have you craving seconds in no time. Start by marinating the shrimp in garlic, ginger, olive oil, honey, and soy sauce. After a quick soak in the fridge, cook the shrimp until just firm and finish with a reduction of the flavorful marinade. Serve over cooked rice with steamed broccoli, and drizzle the thickened sauce over the top. Garnish with scallions for the perfect finishing touch.

instructions.display_text: Place the shrimp in a resealable bag or medium bowl.
Make the marinade: In a small bowl or liquid measuring cup, mix together the garlic, ginger, olive oil, honey, and soy sauce.
Pour half of the marinade on the shrimp, massaging through the bag or stirring to coat. Reserve the remaining marinade. Marinate the shrimp in the refrigerator for 15 minutes.

In a medium pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Remove the shrimp from the marinade, discarding the marinade, then add to the pan and cook for about 1 minute, then flip. Pour in the reserved marinade and continue cooking until the shrimp are opaque and just firm, about 1 minute more. Remove the shrimp from the pan and continue cooking the marinade until reduced and thickened, about 5 minutes.
Serve the shrimp over cooked rice with steamed broccoli alongside. Pour the reduced sauce over the shrimp and garnish with scallions.
Enjoy!

results.keywords: garlic, goodful, honey, shrimp, soy sauce, stir-fry
results.name: Honey Garlic Shrimp Stir-Fry

compilations.description: Eating on a tight budget doesn't mean you need to sacrifice flavor or on quality ingredients. The chili cheese dog boats pack a punch and are easy on the wallet. Our freezer-prep bean burritos are under $10 and will fill you right up! Meanwhile, the spaghetti with garlic and oil is perfect for when you're running low on grocery goods. Eat well, live well, save well, spend well - but never say no to flavor.
compilations.name: Budget-Friendly Dinner Recipes You'll Want To Bookmark ASAP

compilations.description: We’ve got the easiest and fastest meal plan for an entire week. Not sold yet? Each meal only needs 4 ingredients. Kickstart your Monday with our Avocado Peach and Feta Toast and round out your weekend with a classic comfort food: a Bean and Cheese Burrito. Cooking doesn't have to be hard or intimidating: in fact, it's a 4-step process of fun!
compilations.name: 4 Ingredient Recipes For An Entire Week

compilations.description: Everyone loves pasta. No, seriously – the shapes, the flavors, the possibilities! Whether you're just starting to make your own or you've been rolling pasta dough like a pro this pandemic, we've got the right thing for every pasta lover. Start off with a simple but stunning Spaghetti with Garlic and Oil. Then, work your way up to a MasterChef-worthy Tomato Risotto with Shrimp, courtesy of the one and only Wolfgang Puck! We've got everything you need for a pasta party. Mangia!
compilations.name: Pasta Recipes: From Easy To Hard

compilations.description: You know those people who can't cook but love to eat? Are you one of those people? Well then, we're here to save your day with these easy recipes that are anything but boring. Test out our scrumptious Sweet Potato Chips.Then, follow them up with a fun and flavorful plate of Spaghetti with Garlic & Oil. Try out these foolproof recipes and tell all your friends – get ready to impress them with your surprise cooking skills! Believe me, they're going to be floored.
compilations.name: Easy Recipes Anyone Can Make!

compilations.description: It's been a long time since you've had a classic getaway that lets you escape the stresses of life. Well, don't worry, you don't need to splurge on a plane ticket just yet – we can bring your ideal Italian adventure to you! Yes, you heard right. Whether you whip up a cheesy, One Pan Pepperoni Pizza or our light and luxurious Zucchini Ravioli, we promise you'll love these Italian delights.
compilations.name: Foods That Will Transport You To Italy

compilations.description: It can be hard to find good food on a budget. But don't worry, we can help with that. We're bringing a whole set of ideas to your table: ten recipes under $10, just for you. For a sweet start to your morning, try out our Blueberry Banana Pancakes, then whip up a batch of our super-filling Chicken & Veggie Stir Fry for a hearty weeknight meal. The best part? Your wallet's doing a happy dance.
compilations.name: 10 Recipes Under $10

compilations.description: Want to experience the exotic flavors from around the world  but are too busy to travel? Here's the solution, why not bring your destination to your kitchen! Time to experience the luxury fashion and renaissance art of wonderful Italy in a different way through your culinary senses. Buon appetito!
compilations.name: Bring Italy To Your Kitchen

compilations.description: All hail the vegan variety hour! Here's a highlight reel of delicious recipes that happen to be vegan. From a quick Chickpea Salad Sandwich to a hearty Eggplant Potato Tomato Stew, Tasty is bringing deliciously amazing recipes to all our vegan fans.
compilations.name: Vegan Variety Hour

results.description: Spaghetti with garlic and oil is a classic Italian dish that's quick and easy to make, with just a few simple ingredients.

instructions.display_text: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.  Cook the pasta according to package instructions. Save ¼ cup (60 ml) of pasta water, then drain.
Add the olive oil and garlic to a large cold sauté pan. Turn the heat to medium-low and slowly heat up until the garlic is fragrant and lightly colored, about 3 minutes.
Add the chile flakes and cook for another minute.
Add the reserved pasta water and bring to a simmer. Add the cooked spaghetti and parsley, if using. Stir until the pasta is well-coated. Season with salt to taste.
Enjoy!

results.keywords: aglio e olio, cacio e pepe, canned tomato, easy recipe, garlic, italian, linguine, pantry, parmesan, pasta, penne, pomodoro, puttatesca, spaghetti, spicy pasta, tomato sauce, tuna
results.name: Spaghetti With Garlic And Oil
